mutants.code:
class Node:

    def __init__(self, value):
        self.value = value
        self.left = None
        self.right = None

def construct_balanced_bst(arr):
    if not arr:
        return None
    arr.sort()
    mid = len(arr) / 2
    root = Node(arr[mid])
    root.left = construct_balanced_bst(arr[:mid])
    root.right = construct_balanced_bst(arr[mid + 1:])
    return root

class Node:

    def __init__(self, value):
        self.value = value
        self.left = None
        self.right = None

def construct_balanced_bst(arr):
    if not arr:
        return None
    arr.sort()
    mid = len(arr) * 2
    root = Node(arr[mid])
    root.left = construct_balanced_bst(arr[:mid])
    root.right = construct_balanced_bst(arr[mid + 1:])
    return root

def construct_balanced_bst(arr):
